mapper.select: SELECT atch_no, atch_parent_no, atch_category, atch_file_name, atch_original_name, atch_file_size, atch_fancy_size, atch_content_type, atch_path, atch_down_cnt, atch_del_yn, atch_reg_date FROM attach WHERE atch_no = #{atch_no} AND atch_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT atch_no, atch_original_name, atch_fancy_size, atch_down_cnt, TO_CHAR(atch_reg_date, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS atch_reg_date FROM attach WHERE atch_parent_no = #{atch_parent_no} AND atch_del_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attach ( atch_no, atch_parent_no, atch_category, atch_file_name, atch_original_name, atch_file_size, atch_fancy_size, atch_content_type, atch_path, atch_down_cnt, atch_del_yn, atch_reg_date ) VALUES ( seq_attach.NEXTVAL, #{atch_parent_no}, #{atch_category}, #{atch_file_name}, #{atch_original_name}, #{atch_file_size}, #{atch_fancy_size}, #{atch_content_type}, #{atch_path}, 0, 'N', SYSDATE )
